# Dgymbook-wordle-Assignment
# Wordle Clone

A modern, responsive Wordle clone built with React and Tailwind CSS. This project features a clean UI, dark mode support, and smooth animations.

![Wordle Clone Screenshot](data:image/png;base64,)

## Features

- üéÆ Classic Wordle gameplay
- üåì Dark mode support
- ‚å®Ô∏è Virtual keyboard with color feedback
- üì± Fully responsive design
- ‚ú® Smooth animations and transitions
- ‚ö° Built with performance in mind

## Tech Stack

- React 18
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide React (for icons)

## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- Node.js (v14 or higher)
- npm or yarn

### Installation

1. Clone the repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/wordle-clone.git
cd wordle-clone
```

2. Install dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

3. Start the development server
```bash
npm start
```

4. Open your browser and visit `http://localhost:3000`

## Game Rules

1. You have 6 attempts to guess a 5-letter word
2. After each guess, the letters will be color-coded:
   - üü© Green: Correct letter in the correct position
   - üü® Yellow: Correct letter in the wrong position
   - ‚¨ú Gray: Letter not in the word

## Project Structure

```
src/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Grid.js      # Game grid component
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Keyboard.js  # Virtual keyboard component
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ cn.js         # Utility for combining class names
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ words.js      # Word list and random word generator
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ App.js           # Main application component
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ index.js         # Application entry point
```
